A careless engineer signed two blockchain transactions with the SAME nonce. Use the leaked signatures to recover their secret key from this message: Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493f2a760921508e7ab6be40398e472a16310a5998538d12e135e4ece5144f97cd38
Sig2: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493f146dec94bd41364551a8e7bddaa24d4112596ca8953fbbbcbb30a99c6f34cb20

2. Second signed message
Curve: secp256k1The flag format is flag{hex(private_key)}
